alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 8:45AM CDT until June 04 at 7:40AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Emporia affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Emporia. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South bank of the Cottonwood River 1 mile south of Emporia floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 7.8 feet by Sunday evening. It will fall further to 6.9 feet by Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
